column4: hi everyone, i wanted to ask a quick question, is there something like the windows api for linux? some library to make windows buttons etc in c/c++ for linux? thanks
hi everyone, i wanted to ask a quick question, is there something like the windows api for linux? some library to make windows buttons etc in c/c++ for linux? thanks
are you just looking for a graphical toolkit? like, Qt or GTK?
just look at them both and pick which one looks best for your use :)
